|text1    = [[Bond of Life]] will absorb healing effects that a character receives. This will prevent them from recovering HP.<br>After this character is healed for an amount equal to the Bond of Life, the Bond can then be cleared.

|text2    = When a character is granted another Bond of Life, the healing required to clear the Bond of Life will also stack.<br>The Bond of Life has a very long duration if not actively canceled or removed by a Statue of The Seven.
